entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Smiths Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:23 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of light snow this morning and ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
